Society

The news of Omska today is the Comunidade de Game 2021, the Machine, 115 Omsk, the news of the Omska hunting in the Omska oblast, the Omsk Consumer Protection Society, the news of the Omsk, the cost of the Omska hunting trip " avito omsk

  • In Russia, driving licences were extended for three years.

    byCheplev Alexei30.12.2023
    30.12.202397 views

    The Government of the Russian Federation extended the driving permits, which expired in 2024-2025, for a period of three years. This measure will affect more than five million drivers, both personal and commercial. Automatic extension of the driver ' s rights will be automatic, without the need to apply to the GHBD or IFC. It won't take any...

  • Novosibirsk, a storm warning was launched on 10 and 11 September

    byCheplev Alexei09.09.2023
    09.09.2023184 views

    In Novosibir province, namely Novosibirsk, a storm warning was launched on 10 and 11 September. It is expected that in these days, due to the unfavourable weather conditions of the first category of hazards, harmful contamination in the air will be poorly dispersed. The message was published on the West Sibir Meteorship website. Meteosmosis doesn't allow harmful interference in the air...

  • Which is strictly forbidden to do on the first mirror date of the fall 09.09.2023

    byCheplev Alexei09.09.2023
    09.09.2023279 views

    On a mirror date, friends, conspirators or followers can be found to implement future plans. Like all mystical numbers, the mirror date 09.09.2023 has its unique energy. The dates of the world are always twofold: on the one hand, they can be successful, on the other hand, with some difficulties. It depends.

  • On instructions from Vitalia Hémosco in Omske, a new school project was discussed in Quartalah Dravarta

    byCheplev Alexei07.07.2023
    07.07.202312 views

    The workshop was organized by the Minister of Education, Ivan Krott, the modern school should be located in a micro-region that builds on the Levobérezje by the Bruznika. The Chief of Construction and Chief Architect of Natalia Starchenkov, Head of Education of Omsk Ildar Bikmaev and Director of Quarta Dravarta project of the Evgeny Golovkin Brosnik, participated in the discussion. School with slope in science...

  • Carbon, sulphide and formaldehyde in June

    byCheplev Alexei07.07.2023
    07.07.20231 views

    In June, the Omskinform was breathing carbon, sulphide and formaldehyde. The synoptics described environmental pollution identified in the region last month. They found dangerous substances in the air. The Obi-Irtysh UGM specialists published information on environmental pollution identified in the region last month. In June, the NMM regime was declared in...

  • The commemoration of the Omsk Oblast Students ' Day was completed by a sports night at horses

    byCheplev Alexei29.01.2023
    29.01.20231 views

    An interactive programme, competitions and prizes were organized for young people. Today, our region has witnessed the final event of a line of events commemorating the Day of Russian Students. The Red Star was hit by mass racing under the federal " Sports Student Night " project. The Omsk region has been joining the project for the third year...

  • In Om oblast, there was a clap of gas that broke windows in the apartment of the four-story house.

    byCheplev Alexei29.01.2023
    29.01.20233 views

    The incident brought a local resident to the hospital. She got burns. On Saturday, 28 January, in the four-story house in the Big Bed, a gas clamour was produced, which caused windows in the room and on the logia in one apartment. This is what Oleg Bormotov reported to the newspaper Nasha...

  • The minister with the coffiner jokes. Who brought gold to Omsk by the Russian Empire

    byCheplev Alexei29.01.2023
    29.01.20234 views

    The Omish Archivists Dmitri Petine and Maxim Stelmak are not the first year to examine the biography of the highest figures of the Civil War. One of the figures is Ivan Adrianović Mikhailov, who served as Minister of Finance in White Omske. His fate is amazing. How it all started, he was born on a treachery in the family of political sons, and then he was successful...

  • In Omske, the MES met a train of mysterious refugees from Crimea

    byCheplev Alexei29.01.2023
    29.01.20237 views

    On the night of Saturday, on Sunday, 29 January, internally displaced Crimean settlers arrived in Omsk on a train from Simferopol. This was reported by the press service of the MSU in Om province. MES staff met new arrivals. Among the refugees are small children. In addition, the Ministry of Regional Affairs of the Republic of the Sudan is escorted and supervised by the people ' s hosts.

    23.12.20221 views

    The Oma Quaveners next year should be on Channel One of the Chelabin Group Eurasia, composed of three representatives of the Oma KN, became one of the winners First league. In Permi, the finale of the International Union of the NSA passed. The game itself took place on 10 December, but its results were not specifically announced to...

  • In Omsk, there was a new university, the Federal Academy of Social Technology.

    byCheplev Alexei23.12.2022
    23.12.20220 views

    The rector of the educational institution was the former OmGPU Proctor Victor Ivanovich Gam. According to the Rusprofile site, the autonomous non-profit organization of higher education, the Federal Academy of Social Technology, was registered with 20.12.22. Legal address: Frunze,1/4, office 508. Higher education is the main activity of the organization. We add that Vladimir Gam is the leader of seven organizations, one of which is liquidated...

  • In Omske, there was a new bow

    byCheplev Alexei23.12.2022
    23.12.20223 views

    In Omske, a new university in the Non-Profit Social Technology Academy was headed by the former Omgwu Educational Manager, Vladimir Gam. On 20 December, Omsk registered a new autonomous non-profit higher education organization. It was called the Federal Academy of Social Technologies. As Super Omsk reports, the academy will be available at Frunze, 1, to 4....

  • The Court found the unlawful decision of the Omni UFAS to collude between Shipielov and Wagner.

    byCheplev Alexei20.11.2022
    20.11.20220 views

    The agency ' s findings were allegedly inconsistent with the " Protection of Competition " FR. We will recall that, according to the investigation, the former CEO of Omskavtodora, Alexei Shipilov, and the head of Travis, Jacob Wagner, received contracts for the repair and maintenance of the tracks, but the bid was allegedly undervalued. So they created artificial competition and prevented other contractors from auctioning...

  • " Population secured " : the gas disengagement in the north of Om was limited to entrepreneurs and law enforcement

    byCheplev Alexei20.11.2022
    20.11.20220 views

    The resumption of gas supply will be reported further. On the eve of the Tarsky, Znamen and Terresian regions, notification of full limitation of gas supply was received. This is related to the threat of a gas distribution network accident. It was also pointed out that the re-establishment of gas supply would be reported further. So that the locals don't care, in the Om oblast Minsk region, they made it clear that the gas disengagement concerns...

  • " No matter what you sniff, it's important that we have the numbers. "

    byCheplev Alexei20.11.2022
    20.11.20221 views

    On the other day, the Russian Foundation for Support and Development of Environmental Initiatives, Compas, reported that it was organizing " international " air monitoring in Omsk and Chelyabinsk until the end of this year. Eco-activists should come to mysterious millionaires and, in their visit, bring to the attention of the authorities and the public the slow pace of implementation of the Clean Air Project - We're offering eco-activists to get together. ...

  • In Om oblast, a contractor was identified for the construction of a school in the Yasnaya Field

    byCheplev Alexei20.11.2022
    20.11.20220 views

    The public procurement website summarized the electronic auction for the development of work documents and the construction of a school of 1,122 places. It will be located in the village of Troiccoe Omsky District in Yasnaya Polana. The capital of the Development Capital is the winner. The Moscow company will do 1, 145 billion roubles. It's...

  • The synoptics told me what the weather was waiting for the long weekend.

    byCheplev Alexei03.11.2022
    03.11.20220 views

    They predict the snow and the holoid. Helen Adarenko, Chief of Meteopronos of the Ob-Irtysh U.S. Department of Meteopronos. She reported that weather conditions were expected to deteriorate in the region. " I believe my information will not be pleasant because weather conditions are expected to deteriorate in Om province. It's, above all, ammo of mixed intensity...
